title: The Forgotten Cemetery

The cemetery is visited by those wishing to complete the Wilderness Diary, as a medium task requires the player to kill an ankou in the Wilderness and is the one of the two locations where they can be found.

The Forgotten Cemetery
Released29 March 2004 (Update)
MembersNo

↓
Ruins (west)

The Forgotten Cemetery is a minor area in the Wilderness at around level 30. It contains ankous, ghosts, man, skeletons, and zombies. The cemetery is visited by those wishing to complete the Wilderness Diary, as a medium task requires the player to kill an ankou in the Wilderness and is the one of the two locations where they can be found.

The Agility shortcut (level 64) just north-west of the cemetery is a one-way shortcut from the God Wars Dungeon into the Wilderness.

Ian's Wilderness Cape Shop, which sells team capes with crosses on them, can be found inside the cemetery itself.

Ways to get there[edit | edit source]

  • Use Cemetery Teleport (spell or portal in POH) or the Cemetery teleport tablet, which will teleport you directly to the cemetery.
  • Use Dareeyak Teleport or Dareeyak teleport tablet, which will teleport you to ruins, south of the cemetery.
  • Use burning amulet to teleport to Lava Maze, then run south-west. This WILL take you to level 41 Wilderness.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Interestingly enough, there is a single man who wanders the cemetery. His dialogue is the same as other men found throughout Gielinor and he doesn't show any signs that he is in an extremely dangerous area. His drops and pickpocketing loot are also the same as other men.

'''The Forgotten Cemetery''' is a minor area in the [[Wilderness]] at around level 30. It contains [[ankou]]s, [[ghosts]], [[man]], [[skeletons]], and [[zombies]]. The cemetery is visited by those wishing to complete the [[Wilderness Diary]], as a medium task requires the player to kill an ankou in the Wilderness and is the one of the two locations where they can be found.

The [[Agility shortcut]] (level 64) just north-west of the cemetery is a one-way shortcut from the [[God Wars Dungeon]] into the Wilderness.

[[Ian's Wilderness Cape Shop]], which sells [[team cape]]s with crosses on them, can be found inside the cemetery itself.

==Ways to get there==
*Use [[Cemetery Teleport]] (spell or portal in POH) or the [[Cemetery teleport]] tablet, which will teleport you directly to the cemetery.
*Use [[Dareeyak Teleport]] or [[Dareeyak teleport]] tablet, which will teleport you to ruins, south of the cemetery.
*Use [[burning amulet]] to teleport to [[Lava Maze]], then run south-west. This WILL take you to level 41 Wilderness.

==Trivia==
*Interestingly enough, there is a single [[man]] who wanders the cemetery. His dialogue is the same as other men found throughout [[Gielinor]] and he doesn't show any signs that he is in an extremely dangerous area. His drops and [[pickpocketing]] loot are also the same as other men.
